biog.entry.name: RISHWORTH, the Hon. Amanda Louise
biog.entry.description: Biography for RISHWORTH, the Hon. Amanda Louise
biog.entry.electorate.name: Member for Kingston (SA)
biog.entry.title: Biography for RISHWORTH, the Hon. Amanda Louise
biog.entry.electorate.state.name: Member for Kingston (SA)
biog.entry.party.name: Australian Labor Party

parliamentary.service.title: Parliamentary Service
parliamentary.service.para: Elected to the House of Representatives for Kingston, South Australia, 2007, 2010 and 2013.

ministerial.appointments.title: Ministerial Appointments
ministerial.appointments.para: Parliamentary Secretary for Sustainability and Urban Water from 25.3.13 to 18.9.13.
Parliamentary Secretary for Disabilities and Carers from 25.3.13 to 18.9.13.

committee.service.title: Committee Service
committee.service.para: House of Representatives Standing: Communications from 19.2.08 to 19.7.10; Health and Ageing from 19.2.08 to 19.7.10; Health from 4.12.13; Industry, Science and Innovation from 19.2.08 to 19.7.10; Education and Employment from 25.10.10 (Chair from 28.10.10) to 14.5.13.
Joint Standing: Electoral Matters from 25.10.10 to 14.5.13; National Broadband Network from 21.11.11 to 14.8.12; National Disability Insurance Scheme from 4.12.13.

parliamentary.party.positions.title: Parliamentary Party Positions
parliamentary.party.positions.para: Shadow Parliamentary Secretary for Health from 18.10.13 to 1.7.14.
Member, Opposition Shadow Ministry from 1.7.14. Shadow Assistant Minister for Education and Shadow Assistant Minister for Higher Education from 1.7.14.

quals.work.pre.parliament.title: Qualifications and Occupation before entering Federal Parliament

electorate.title: Electorate
electorate.para: Location: south-western Adelaide; it includes the suburbs of Aldinga Beach, Christie Downs, Christies Beach, Hackham, Hallett Cove, Huntfield Heights, Lonsdale, Maslin Beach, Moana, Morphett Vale, Old Noarlunga, Onkaparinga Hills, Port Noarlunga, Reynella, Seaford, Sellicks Beach, Sheidow Park, Port Willunga, Trott Park and Woodcroft, and parts of Happy Valley.
Industries: construction, automotive components manufacturing, desalination, major retailing and various small industries including brickworks, optical lenses, clothing and engineering.
State electorates: Kingston includes the South Australian House of Assembly electorate of Reynell, and parts of Bright, Finniss, Fisher, Kaurna, Mawson and Mitchell.
